arabic_text: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفٗا مُّنَشَّرَةٗ
translation: (52) Rather, every person among them desires that he[1797] would be given scriptures spread about.[1798]
footnotes:
[1797]- Instead of Muḥammad (ﷺ).
[1798]- i.e., made public.  Much of their refusal of his message was due to envy and jealousy of the Prophet (ﷺ).
